answers.answer: Sorry but im curious wats mucus plug?
They say u can lose it two months early... usually it will re form if it's too soon . But yes definitely talk to a professional if you are worried!! Good luck!!
I lost mine at 31 weeks with my last pregnancy and had my son at 38 weeks and 6 days!! So I'm pretty sure you are safe !!
Thanks for responding ladies. It helps me relax enough to sleep. I can call my nurse in the AM.. I hate when these things happen at night :/

I lost mine at 27 weeks and had my son at 32 but he was emergency csection because of preeclampsia...I didn't go into labor. You should be ok but since u r so far along, I don't think it will be long!!

Loosing ur mucus plug dont mean u will go labour soon, as ladies saying bt it dose protect ur baby from all those germs from outside so have shower more often and if you choose to have sex i advice to use protection. Good luck x

question: I'm only 32+5 and I think I just lost my mucus plug. I plan on calling the nurse in the AM and have a growth scan scheduled for Friday morning so I'm hoping I can see my doc then...But I'm nervous about losing it so soon. Anyone else lose theirs early and not have any issues? The last thing I need is this baby coming anytime in the next 2 weeks :s
title: lost mucus plug? nervous...
